attributes.action: Review Southern Rail and withdraw the franchise. Think about peoples livelihood.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a headline story in the news .. to name just a few
https://theconversation.com/chaos-on-southern-trains-a-symptom-of-britains-rotten-privatised-railway-industry-62117
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2016/jul/08/all-aboard-southern-trains-disaster-commuters-caught-in-war-on-rails#comment-78577035
It is becoming increasingly worse and is effecting peoples livelihood - Southern Rail say it will eventually get better - but when? - this has dire economic consequences.
attributes.background: Southern rail is increasingly awful, to the point it can no longer be relied on as a service that will get you to your job/ doctors etc, or even home- we are now regretfully moving towns because of this. Anyone south of the Thames pays exuberant amounts of money for a service that does not work.
